description:
A favourite, thanks to a light frame and streamlined features. The Clifton's early-stage rocker gives you a fluid take-off and efficient ride. The 9th iteration is even lighter and more cushioned than ever with an additional 3mm in stack height. Increased rubber coverage underfoot adds durability and surefootedness.

  • Lightweight engineered mesh upper with mesh gusset to hold tongue in place
  • High stack-height EVA midsole for shock absorption and stable ride
  • Deep foot-frame allows the foot to sink into the midsole and adds stability
  • Shaped heel encourages a smooth, fast transition to forefoot
  • Early stage Meta-Rocker for smoother heel-to-toe transitions
  • Durabrasion outsole with high-abrasion rubber in wear areas for durability and traction
name: Hoka One One Clifton 9 Road Running Shoes - Men's
